0.2.0.name: connect20/Mconnect_Customerspecificproduct
0.2.0.description: This Extension allows admin to easily assign products to customers and customer groups through product grid from admin customer edit and customer group edit section, we have integrated product grid to customer edit and customer group edit section from admin,  it is possible to make certain products only viewable to specific customer and customer group using this extension

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
